english.segment1: She reaches for her latest reading. Her pillow's folded. Her mind is reeling round
english.segment2: She can't remember. What made this different. Before her clock was. Fifteen minutes fast
english.segment3: (Chorus). When the morning came. It was just the same. Genevieve. Like a loaded gun. Like a letter bomb. Genevieve
english.segment4: She reaches for her latest feeling. She can't control it. Her heart is beating. She made her mind up. It's off to sleep now. To dream about the book she just put down
